ref: 14833 sarga -- : K. sagun (caus. sagawun, sagarun) ʻ to irrigate, water, sprinkle water on ʼ rather < MIA. *sagga -- pp. to pres. st. sajj -- (aor. pass. asarji RV., caus. sarjayati, Pa. sajjēti ~ sr̥játi, ˚tē ʻ lets water flow ʼ RV., Pa. sajati ʻ lets loose ʼ, Pk. sayaï ʻ drips, flows ʼ) after type bhajjaï ~ bhagga -- .
